definitions.definition: An entity assuming a financial risk.
A person working for an insurance company who arranges and authorizes an insurance policy with a broker or insured .
An entity undertaking to market newly issued securities.
examples: They were the underwriters of the company's shares, but only on a "best efforts" basis.

main_definition: An entity assuming a financial risk.
secondary_definitions: ( insurance ) A person working for an insurance company who arranges and authorizes an insurance policy with a broker or insured .
( finance ) An entity undertaking to market newly issued securities.
